page.title: 17GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: {DARTS: Justin Harlock Age:9 I like playing {darts},{darts}are little things that you throw at a round board made of cork.Me and my friend play{darts}nearly every night. We score in rounds.I take my{darts} then throw them at the board then add my score up,then my mate has his go. Most proper games start with 501 and work downwards.Eric Bristow and Keith Deller are my favourite players. {BOXING: Paul Partridge Age:10 } {Boxing}is like a game but there are two opponents and a referee.Each opponent has a pair of gloves and a gumshield.The opponents play in a square ring with ropes.The object of the game is to knock the other person out for ten seconds.There's a bell that tells you when to stop fighting. The referee holds up the winners hand. The judges decide who wins by points.
